org.stekikun.dolmen.automaton

Class NFA.Transition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stekikun.dolmen.automaton.NFA.Transition
  • Enclosing class:
    NFA

    public static final class NFA.Transition
extends Object
    A transition in the NFA is an event decorated with a set of tags.

    The tags represent the markers which must be updated with the current input string position when following this transition.

    Author:
    St√©phane Lescuyer
